About Me

I'm a software engineer living in the San Francisco Bay Area.

I'm a creative. Here is my website.

I'm looking for my first software development job. Please give me job!!! My goal is to find a job that makes the most of my technical skills to create useful software that makes a positive impact.

I'm always excited to be learning. See for yourself.

I'm currently finishing a B.S. in Computer Science from Oregon State University, planning to graduate by the end of 2019. I also graduated cum laude from UC Berkeley with a B.A. in Rhetoric. What did I do inbetween these college years? None of your business.

Check Out My Projects »

In my spare time, I'm always looking to be involved in my community.

I currently co-facilitate a book club focusing on rereading children's literature, as well as serve as a board member of a LGBT square dancing club. In the past, I've tutored kids reading below grade level, helped high school students with financial aid applications, and was a bouncer at a gem and minerals show. Hobbies include hiking, swimming, orienteering, and writing About Me pages.
